articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Manchester United vs Olympique Lyonnais in the UEFA Europa League
articles.title: Man Utd 5-4 Lyon (7-6 on aggregate after extra time): Harry Maguire scores sensational late winner

articles.description: Dominic Solanke's first-half penalty keeps Tottenham Hotspur's season alive as they beat Eintracht Frankfurt to reach the semi-finals of the Europa League.
articles.title: Dominic Solanke penalty enough as Spurs edge into Europa League semi-finals

articles.description: Chris Dobey wins his first Premier League night of 2025 with a 6-2 win over Stephen Bunting on an evening of shocks in Rotterdam.
articles.title: Premier League Darts results: Chris Dobey beats Stephen Bunting in Rotterdam final

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary and follow live text updates and match stats as Rangers visit Athletic Bilbao in the second leg of their Europa League quarter-final.
articles.title: Athletic Club vs Rangers: UEFA Europa League LIVE - updates, radio, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Chelsea book their place in the Conference League semi-finals despite a defeat by visitors Legia Warsaw in the second leg.
articles.title: Chelsea 1-2 Legia Warsaw: Blues reach Conference League semi-finals despite defeat

articles.description: Top seed Carlos Alcaraz eases into the quarter-finals of the Barcelona Open with a 6-2 6-4 win over Laslo Djere 6-2 6-4.
articles.title: Barcelona Open: Carlos Alcaraz beats Laslo Djere in straight sets to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: Lando Norris is leading the drivers' championship but says he is being forced to drive in a different way in order to get the best out of his car.
articles.title: Saudi Arabian Grand Prix 2025: Lando Norris being 'forced' to drive McLaren a different way

articles.description: England ask Essex to rest seamer Sam Cook this weekend, putting him in line for an England Test debut.
articles.title: Sam Cook: Essex seamer rested at England's request

articles.title: Lazio 3-1 Bodo/Glimt (agg 3-3, 2-3 on pens): Norwegians reach first European semi-final

articles.description: Golf bosses are warning recreational players to avoid cheating on their handicaps.
articles.title: World Handicap System manipulators are cheats - says R&A
